attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we would like a stronger leadership from  the prime minister showing that he is a gainst the introduction of Sharia laws in to this country.. 
It is against all human rights and democracy to introduce any aspects of sharia law. If people come to live in our country they must accept our laws. Our laws have evolved from a Judeo/Christian root. Treating different people in different ways sets a very dangerous precedent. Stop pushing us down a multiculturalistic pathway. It certainly is degrading towards woman as in sharia law, woman are worth only half what a man's worth. God forbid.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
